successes.title: Sentinel Tactics: The Flame of Freedom
successes.description: Sentinel Tactics: The Flame of Freedom is the hex-grid based tactical combat game for 2-8 players set in the world of Sentinel Comics!

Pledges.description:
HEROIC FIGURES!
Get Sentinels Miniatures: The Flame of Freedom! This is a pack of unique miniatures that correspond to the characters in Sentinel Tactics: The Flame of Freedom. (Domestic Shipping Included.)

HEROIC COMBAT!
Get Sentinel Tactics: The Flame of Freedom. This contains everything you need to play Sentinel Tactics, including two environment maps, nine characters, and nine villain scenarios. (Domestic Shipping Included.)
SUPERHEROIC FIGURES! Get Sentinels Miniatures: The Flame of Freedom PLUS all of the Stretch Goal characters and miniatures from this campaign! (Domestic Shipping Included.)

HEROIC FIGURES AND COMBAT!
Get Sentinel Tactics: The Flame of Freedom AND Sentinels Miniatures: The Flame of Freedom, the corresponding miniatures pack. (Domestic Shipping Included.)

SUPERHEROIC FIGURES AND COMBAT!
Get everything from all the Pledge Levels on this Kickstarter, including the game Sentinel Tactics: The Flame of Freedom AND Sentinels Miniatures: The Flame of Freedom PLUS all of the miniatures for all of the Stretch Goal characters! (Domestic Shipping Included.)

SUPER HEROICS IN FULL COLOR! Get everything from the SUPERHEROIC FIGURES AND COMBAT Pledge Level, including unpainted miniatures, shipped to you by December 2014. Then, get a painted set of Sentinel Miniatures: The Flame of Freedom AND a painted set of Sentinel Miniatures: Uprising sent to you by March 2015! (Domestic Shipping Included.)
